topic.title: Filipino Translation
topic.body:
Hi , 

I would like to translate your README.md for Tagalog so that you would enable to reach my fellow Filipino's 

Your reply is highly appreciated. Thanks

1604066362_mirrored_cordeta_github.body:
tl_PH is the abbrevation for TAGALOG 
at the same time i would also like to make 
cb_PH which is the Cebuano Counterpart of Tagalog 

Thank You
